document.full_text: the dallas mavericks blitzed the oklahoma city thunder in the first quarter and held off a late rally for a 93-87 victory on saturday to take a 2-1 lead in their western conference finals series.
document.title: thunder rumble late but mavs hang on to take 2-1 lead
lines_and_colors: the dallas mavericks blitzed the oklahoma city thunder in the first quarter and held off a late rally for a 93-87 victory on saturday to take a 2-1 lead in their western conference finals series.
